modName: Channeled dual casting animation fix in third person view
summary: Fixes the extremely jerky animation while channeling a spell and turning in third person view.
descriptionHtml:
Video showcasing the difference: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ebe7MT6D1mQ

UPDATE: removed some unnecessary files that modified other animations too. This is only a temporary fix, until better one is made and when the modding tools are finally released. :)

To Install: just unpack the files into your Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\ folder.

Managed to fix the third person channeling animation to stop switching between two different stances if you moved your mouse. Also improves the aiming of the channeled spell a lot by having it not move around as much while turning.

If anyone can improve this, please do. :)
author: Katulobotomia
